name: Mirror Master Data
description: Module migrates the intersect of fields found in parent and child project

project-settings.name: If longitudinal, enter the source event name
List of Child Projects to receive Mirrored Data

sub_settings.name:
Triggering Form
Only clone if this form is saved. If left blank, any save in the project will trigger a clone.

Trigger logic in Parent
Only clone if this logical expression is true (leave blank for always clone)

Excluded fields
List of fields to exclude from copying to child project(s)

Include only fields
List of fields to include - if specified ONLY these fields will be copied to the child project(s)

Include only fields from this CHILD form
Intersection of fields from child and parent will only include child fields from this form. If left blank, it will include all child fields that intersect with parent fields.

Include only fields from this PARENT form
Intersection of fields from child and parent will only include parent fields from this form. If left blank, it will include all parent fields that intersect with child fields.

Child Field for Parent ID
If this field (from the child project) is specified, then the parent ID will be entered.

Parent Field for Child ID
If this field (from the parent project) is specified, then the child ID will be entered.

Child ID prefix
If this field is specified, then the child ID will be prefixed.

Child ID delimiter
If this field is specified, then suffix and prefix will be delimited with the character.

Child ID padding
If this field is specified, then the unique ID of the child ID will be padded with zeros to this number of characters. For example, a padding of 4 will result in an id:STAN-0004

Clobber existing data
If this field is checked, then if there is existing data in the child project for that field, the data will be clobbered.

Migration Timestamp in Parent Project
Upon completion of migration, timestamp will be entered in this field.

Migration NOTES in Parent Project
Upon completion of migration, notes will be entered in this field.
